p: GC-MS analysis of the essential oils was conducted on an Agilent 6890N-5973 insert gas chromatograph (Agilent Technologies, Palo Alto, CA, USA) using an HP-5MS5% phenyl methyl siloxane capillary column (30 mm × 0.25 mm × 0.25 μm) and equipped with an Agilent 6890N-5973 mass selective detector in electron impact mode.
